channel.title: Making Items Donator Only!
channel.description:
ok so i got a few items i'd like to be donator only
like when trying to equip and not a donator it says something like
"you must be a donator of (server name) to use this item"
something along the lines of that
My Deli-ma is... idk what to add in my files for that to work properly
any help would be much appreciated!
